trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe both air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Desiccating Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales yellowish necrotic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) necrotic damage and is weakened until the end of its next turn. A weakened creature has disadvantage on Strength-based ability checks and Strength saving throws, and the creature's weapon attacks that rely on Strength deal half damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):
